bibl.title: Glassware from Roman Egypt at Begram (Afghanistan) and the Red Sea Trade. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - Maritime and overland routes. - The Begram 'treasure'. - The Begram glassware. - Glass in the Red Sea trade. - Begram and the Periplus. - Conclusions and further questions.

bibl.title: British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.seg: Mairs Rachel, Glassware from Roman Egypt at Begram (Afghanistan) and the Red Sea Trade. Avec résumé en anglais.

British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 18 (2012) pp. 61-74, 1 fig. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/publications/online_journals/bmsaes/issue_18/mairs.aspx >.]

Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - Maritime and overland routes. - The Begram 'treasure'. - The Begram glassware. - Glass in the Red Sea trade. - Begram and the Periplus. - Conclusions and further questions.
